targets.expr:
topk(10,
  sum by (http_route, http_request_method, method_route) (
    label_join(ceil(increase(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{service_name=~"$service", deployment_environment=~"$environment", http_route!=""}[$__range])), "method_route", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route")
  ))

topk(10,
  sum by (http_route, http_request_method, method_route) (
    label_join(ceil(increase(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{service_name=~"$service", deployment_environment=~"$environment", http_route!="", error_type!=""}[$__range])), "method_route", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route")
  ))
